Package r2b.apps.lib.taskmanager

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseAsyncTask
    This class is useful for packaging any task implementation and run on a task pool with multithreading and priority support.
    BaseSyncTask<V>
    This class is useful for packaging any task implementation and run on a task pool with multithreading and priority support.
    BaseSyncTaskObserver<V>
    Wraps an Observer to have a more suitable update interface.
    TaskManager
    Manages all concerned of threads, queues, priorities; on task executions.
